\newcommand{\ottdrule}[4][]{{\displaystyle\frac{\begin{array}{l}#2\end{array}}{#3}\quad\ottdrulename{#4}}}
\newcommand{\ottusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\ottnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{vars} ,\, \ottmv{n} ,\, \ottmv{a} ,\, \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} ,\, \ottmv{z} ,\, \ottmv{w} ,\, \ottmv{m} ,\, \ottmv{o} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{ivar} ,\, \ottmv{i} ,\, \ottmv{k} ,\, \ottmv{j} ,\, \ottmv{l} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{const} ,\, \ottmv{b} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottX}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{X}  ,\ \ottnt{Y}  ,\ \ottnt{Z}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{B} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{Y}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{Y}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{p}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \star }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{p}  \otimes  \ottnt{p'}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F}\, \ottnt{p} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G}\, \ottnt{p} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otts}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{s}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{T} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottnt{p} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{contrR}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{contrL}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{weak}\, \ottmv{x} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{F} \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{b}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{let}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{X} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottnt{p} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{app}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{contrR}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{contrL}\, \ottmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} , \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{weak}\, \ottmv{x} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{G} \ottnt{s} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma  ,\ \Delta  ,\ \Phi  ,\ \Psi}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\ottA\ottinterrule
\ottX\ottinterrule
\ottT\ottinterrule
\ottp\ottinterrule
\otts\ottinterrule
\ottt\ottinterrule
\ottG\ottafterlastrule
}}

%% defn tty
\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Unit}   \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{x}  :   \mathsf{Unit}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{triv}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_unitL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXunitR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \cdot   \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Unit} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_unitR}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{w}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{w} , \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcontrR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash   \mathsf{contrR}\, \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_contrR}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcontrL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \vdash   \mathsf{contrL}\, \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_contrL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXweak}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \quad   \ottmv{x}  \not\in |  \Gamma ,  \Delta  |  }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{weak}\, \ottmv{x} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_weak}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXcut}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_cut}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXtenL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{z}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_tenL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXten}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_ten}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpLl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_impLl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpLTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Z}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_impL2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpRl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{Y}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_impRl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXimpRr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{X} . \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_impRr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTXXGr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}   \cdot   \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A} }{%
{\ottdrulename{T\_Gr}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntty}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXunitL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXunitR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXcontrR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXcontrL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXweak{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXcut{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXtenL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXten{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpLl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpLTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpRl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXimpRr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTXXGr{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn sty
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXax}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \cdot   \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_ax}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitlOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Unit}   \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{x}  :   \mathsf{Unit}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{triv}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_unitl1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitlTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Unit}   \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{x}  :   \mathsf{Unit}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{triv}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_unitl2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXunitr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \cdot   \ottsym{;}   \cdot   \vdash   \mathsf{triv}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{Unit} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_unitr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{w}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{ex}\, \ottmv{w} , \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{with}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXweak}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \quad   \ottmv{x}  \not\in |  \Gamma ,  \Delta ,  \Psi  |  }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{weak}\, \ottmv{x} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_weak}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcontrR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{contrR}\, \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_contrR}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcontrL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{3}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{contrL}\, \ottmv{z} \,\mathsf{as}\, \ottmv{x} , \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_contrL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Phi  \vdash  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_cut1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXcutTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_cut2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenLOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{z}  :  \ottnt{X}  \otimes  \ottnt{Y} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_tenL1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenLTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{z}  :  \ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B} \,\mathsf{be}\, \ottmv{x}  \otimes  \ottmv{y} \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_tenL2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXtenR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \Phi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \otimes  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \otimes  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_tenR}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpLl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impLl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpLTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \quad  \Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Delta_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{Y}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_r\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impL2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpLThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impL3}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpLFour}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \quad  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \Delta  \ottsym{;}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{y}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \Phi_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{app}_l\, \ottmv{y} \, \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impL4}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpRl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \lambda_l  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \rightharpoonup  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impRl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXimpRr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \lambda_r  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} . \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}  \leftharpoonup  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_impRr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}   \cdot   \vdash   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X} }{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_Fr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXFl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{X}  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}%
}{
\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X}   \ottsym{,}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{z}  :   \mathsf{F} \ottnt{X}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{F}\, \ottmv{x}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_Fl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXGl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}%
}{
\ottmv{z}  \ottsym{:}   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A}   \ottsym{,}  \Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash   \mathsf{let}\, \ottmv{z}  :   \mathsf{G} \ottnt{A}  \,\mathsf{be}\,  \mathsf{G}\, \ottmv{x}  \,\mathsf{in}\, \ottnt{s}   \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulename{S\_Gl}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnsty}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \ottsym{;}  \Psi  \vdash  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXax{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitlOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitlTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunitr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXweak{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcontrR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcontrL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcutOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXcutTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenLOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenLTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXtenR{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpLl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpLTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpLThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpLFour{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpRl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXimpRr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXFr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXFl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXGl{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJtype}{
\ottdefntty{}\ottdefnsty{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJtype
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
